name: Watermelon Game
description: A Casual Physics Puzzle game, where you have to combine matching Fruits to get Points and increase your Highscore. Play solo or measure your skills against another player online.

name: Chess Exerciser
description: Become a better chess player with learning by repetition. Exercise from 3.000+ opening lines and discover their best continuation. Learn tactics from millions of puzzles split into 38 categories and 11 difficulty levels. Master 18.000+ endgame positions sorted by category and difficulty.

name: Swords & Shields AdvBattleBoard
description: A casual puzzle played with 4 sided chits with a swords or a shield on an edge played on a classic chess board. when chits clash they may rotate or capture the other, your objective is to capture the crown chits, there are 4 on both sides.

name: Immortal Beast
description: Immortal Beast - Dynamic 2D roguelike with a wide variety of enemies and weapons. You will play as a treasure hunter who has decided on a desperate adventure in search of wealth and glory! You will go down into a dark dungeon and enter into an unequal battle with dangerous enemies!

name: Hazardous: Ovesis
description: Ovesis: Hazardous is a crafting-survival game where you explore cyberpunk and biopunk worlds.

name: Great Flame
description: Great Flame is a 3D adventure game with role-playing game (RPG) elements. Take on the role of a traveler who has magical powers and go on a dangerous adventure to explore the depths of the dungeon! You have to clear locations from monsters and bosses using magical weapons!

name: Spread Out! Hold Naar' Havok
description: Easy and deep wargame. Choose your army (the Elves or the Orcs), win the war by controlling 5 of the 9 territories or by killing the enemy king. Deploy reinforcements.

name: Lucky Dungeon
description: Delve through a series of dungeons full of terrors. Fight battles by stopping a board full of your equipment and skills. Press your luck to gain battle resources, but be careful. One bad roll and you can lose everything. This game doesn't contain any real-world currency gambling/microtransactions.

name: Minecraft: Star Wars - Path of the Jedi
description: For Minecraft players who want to experience the thrill of being a Jedi Knight, Minecraft Star Wars: Path of the Jedi offers an immersive experience that lets you train as a padawan, battle monsters, duel other Jedi, and master the force. Support the Jedi council during the clone wars and join on a special mission with Yoda to uncover the mysteries of an uncharted planet. The experience is complete with your droid companion by your side and lightsaber at the ready.

name: Fresh Story
description: Fresh Story is a visual novel about one girl's difficult journey. She will face difficulties and hard decisions to achieve a peaceful life as she dreamed.Diana came from the suburbs to the big city to achieve success and a happy life with her boyfriend Vlad.

name: Treachery in Beatdown City: U.N. Trouble
description: Master the art of the Presidential Fist! Play as Blake Orama dropped off one block from the UN and fight through breakdancing president mascots, election deniers, werewolf loving athletes, and MORE with fireballs, spinning kicks and “Centrist Uppercuts”!

name: Only an Alien Going Up!
description: "Only an Alien Going Up!" is a difficult 3D platformer where your only goal is to climb to the top, without checkpoints.

name: Cyber Blade: Action Platformer
description: Cyber Blade is an adrenaline-pumping cyberpunk action game with a pixelated twist! Destroy your enemies to the beat of stylish music, dodging traps and lasers!

name: Let's Sing 2024 with International Hits: Gold Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Let's Sing 2024 with International Hits: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Total War: Warhammer Trilogy
description:
Explore, expand and conquer a rich fantasy world with legions of mighty heroes or hordes of monstrous units under your command in the Total War: Warhammer Trilogy, bundled at a discount for the very first time.

Boasting all 3 base games, summon the elector counts as the Empire in Total War: Warhammer, burrow beneath your foes to establish secret undercities as the Skaven in Total War: Warhammer II, or spread deadly plagues to weaken your opponents as Nurgle in Total War: Warhammer III.

With this legendary bundle, carry all 16 races from the Trilogy into Total War: Warhammer III's Immortal Empires, and conquer one of the grandest strategy campaigns ever conceived, utilising each race’s unique sets of campaign mechanics, legendary lords, and battle possibilities.

name: Spaceport Trading Company
description: Players take on the role of a spacefaring merchant in a galaxy filled with diverse planets, each with its own economy, resources, and challenges. Amass wealth and reputation by trading goods, negotiating with factions, and navigating the intricacies of interstellar commerce.

name: YetiFree
description: YetiFree is a retro role reversal of the 90's classic SkiFree. Smash, slam, and blast your way down the slopes to rack up the highest score. The Yeti must feed!

name: Typecast
description: Typecast is a bullet hell where you type to shoot. Get swarmed by enemies, manage the chaos, and climb the leaderboards in this unique arcade experience.

name: Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos - Tool Upgrade & New Interior Designs Pack
description: Customize the interior of your house with 3 new fabulous design themes! Mix and match them up to your heart's content! You'll also be able to upgrade your hoe, watering can, hammer, axe, sickle, fishing rod, and pick-axe an additional level, making growing crops, fishing, and mining a breeze!

name: Let's Sing 2024 with International Hits
description: Step into the spotlight. | It's your time to shine!

name: Devil Engine: Complete Edition
description:
Lightning Strikes Again! Take control of the AI ship Andraste and blast through hordes to destroy the Devil Engine!

Devil Engine is a high-octane, classic-styled side-scrolling shoot-em-up heavily influenced by the best in the genre from the 32-bit era, featuring a variety of incredible locations, hand-drawn pixel art, and a blood-pumping soundtrack that brings the dark future to life.

name: Requiem Memory
description: Caution: This game contains high levels of violence There are a lot of bloodstains and violent directions

name: Let's Sing 2024
description: Let’s Sing 2024 brings a thrilling new karaoke experience to your living room. Enjoy chartbreaking hits and all-time classics that are guaranteed to make you sing at the top of your lungs. Step into the spotlight with the brand new career mode and rise to stardom. Become a VIP and test your vocal range with many more songs online. Experience seasonal events online with Let's Sing Fest and join the never-ending karaoke party alone or with friends while you play with people across the globe.

name: Warlocks Deeds
description: Embark on an extraordinary journey through a mystical realm where warlocks and magic reign supreme. Introducing "Warlocks Deeds," a superbly crafted medieval survival sandbox voxel game that will transport you to a world of enchantment and adventure!

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2
description: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 is bigger and better than ever with all new gameplay, campaign, characters, voiceover, modes and more!

name: Age of Wonders 4: Empires & Ashes
description: The empires of mortals resurge after the devastation brought forth by the Wizard Kings. In Empires and Ashes, players fuse Magic and Steel to unleash devastating war machines to drive the Godir back into the Astral Sea. Includes a new Culture, Tomes, Empire Building options and Story Realm.

name: Fellowship
description: Fellowship is a survival action-roguelike game where you assemble a party of 5 heroes to combat hordes of monsters. Utilize unique skills, formations, and synergies to liberate the world of Eldrida from the shadow cast by Goltar, the dark sorcerer.

name: Terracards
description: Farm, sell, learn, repeat. Terracards is a tactical roguelike-deckbuilder where you manage your own farm, You'll utilize animals, crops, and structures through cards, transforming them into valuable resources and wealth with each turn. But beware - deplete your funds, and it's game over.

name: Halls of Watershot
description: A deck-building ARPG in a dark fantasy setting. Find powerful items, wield elemental magic, and battle dangerous monsters as you explore a dark and twisted castle. Combines the decision making and variety of a card game, with the fast paced combat of an ARPG.

name: Stronghold: Definitive Edition
description: Greetings sire! Your stronghold awaits you. Build a castle economy, besiege unforgettable villains and return to the 'castle sim' that started it all. Experience this classic RTS with upgraded visuals, modernised gameplay, Steam multiplayer and a new campaign.

name: Limos' Lair
description: In this Zelda-like / Metroidvania game, you will explore the lair of a long-gone mythical creature and unravel its mysteries. Consume enemies to gain their abilities, use your frog-like tongue to grapple and fight, explore the land, solve puzzles, find secrets, and complete challenges.

name: Vagrus: The Riven Realms - Sunfire and Moonshadow
description: Vagrus's first expansion offers a new, vast region to explore complete with a swathe of new settlements, new enemies to conquer, new stories to be a part of, a large cast of characters, and new quests to complete through which the vagrus may make their mark on Xeryn.

name: Idling Gears
description: Click! Place gears, click! Make money, click! Place more gears, click! Make even more money, click, click and above all click!

name: Sushiman
description: Running a restaurant is no easy task. The chef's way of cooking is a puzzle, he serves in sets of three and only if you manage to properly combine plates. Another challenge is the conveyor belt and anxious customers. Plates never reach them in time, can you work out a solution?

name: Tintin Reporter: Cigars of the Pharaoh
description: Tintin and his faithful companion Snowy are going to experience some extraordinary adventures…After meeting Professor Sarcophagus whilst cruising the Mediterranean Sea, the famous reporter sets out in search of the tomb of the Pharaoh Kih-Oskh.

name: Robocraft 2
description: The sequel to the hit robot building PVP combat game, played by over 16 million players. Robocraft 2 is the ultimate battlefield for player-created content. Build your Robot from scratch, test drive it, and then bring it online to fight against others in epic combat!

name: Tide of Thieves
description: Tide of Thieves is a colorful light-hearted top-down action adventure. You take the helm of a pirate ship crewed by a salty old sea captain, a cannoneer who always expect the worse and a witty cartographer, all trying to claim back their treasure.

name: Redgar: The Space Viking
description: An explosive, story-driven top-down shooter with vibrant pixel graphics and a pumping soundtrack. Fight your way through hallways of castle-like spaceships, neon lit alleys and futuristic medieval fortifications using an array of powerful weapons and special devices.

name: Hydrofoil Generation
description: Hydrofoil Generation is a realistic sailing and foiling simulator. The game focuses on "in-shore" regatta style with heavy emphasis on realism and multiplayer with a first person perspective.

name: Roboquest
description: Roboquest is a fast FPS Roguelite in a scorched futureworld. You're a rebooted Guardian, ready to kick some metal ass! Fight with your buddy or by yourself and annihilate hordes of deadly bots in ever-changing environments.

name: Chica's Party World: Rebaked
description: Chica's Party World: REBAKED is the official reboot / re-imagining of the original game from 2018 by PoisonousPastels and BonBun_Studios. The game sees you playing as a security robot designated with the task of watching over the building and running basic maintenance tasks until proper renovations begin. However (obviously) things aren't quite what they seem at first.

name: Brawl Stars: Bizarre Circus
description: Sin descripción

name: Cubenen Gardens: Befriend
description: Cubenen Gardens: Befriend is a story-driven indie RPG where you play as Michael, a nerdy kangaroo inventor from the Tech District. They have a lifelong goal of making monsters less of a threat to society. And their research takes them to the abandoned offices of the Mall District to test a theory regarding how monsters relate to the memories of the deceased. Things go well, but then they get caught up in a corporate nightmare. Slowly breaking them down and leaving them desperately searching for a way to escape.

name: Shades: Shadow Fight Roguelike
description:
New enemies, new abilities and sequel to Shadow Fight 2 story - Shadow’s adventures continue!

Shades is a RPG fighting game that continues the story of the legendary Shadow Fight 2. Get ready for the enhanced features of the original game that bring your experience to the next level. Fight more battles, see more locations, meet more friends, encounter new enemies, collect powerful Shades and explore the expanded Shadow Fight universe!

name: Tokyo Rock Redemption
description: Dive into the dazzling world of visual kei and join the battle against dark music in this full-length 15-chapter game. The stage is set, the crowd is waiting, and your adventure is about to begin!

name: Football Manager 2024 Mobile
description: This is a mobile port of Football Manager 2024 exclusively for Netflix members.

name: Merge Fellas
description: Merge memes in this puzzle game! Combine meme pets to make them bigger! Be the first to create a giant capybara! Solve the puzzle and merge all the pets!

name: Rosas are Red
description: Meet Rosa, a kind-hearted girl who wants to open up to you in more than one way! Take her on dates, choose your activities and fap your way into her heart.♡ Develop your relationship through your choices. Friend, Lover, Master. Which one are you?

name: Tsukodome
description: Tsukodome is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Hikutsuki and the objective is to explore and collect effects to unlock the endings.

name: Purah's Lab
description:
Purah is waiting for you!!
Her lab is a mess and everybody is busy to help her to finish her experiment...

A machine that can detect all your most sensible points of your body and make you explode in a pleasure that no human can give you.

That's why Purah needs you to pass her the items to build the machine in the shortest time possible and without any mistakes or the energy used in the machine will be overloaded and horrible things could happen...

name: My Sister is Wanted
description: A mouse lost in time and the crimes of their family

name: Cold Abyss
description: Cold Abyss is a relaxing and atmospheric exploration game where you repair internet cables on the bottom of the ocean. There are no enemies or other forms of danger down there. Just you. The perfect game to unwind after a long day.

name: Ship of Fools: Water Garden Duo
description: New Fools have emerged from the ponds. The Water Garden duo is ready to join your crew.

name: Taxi Trouble
description: Pick up customers. Take them to their destination. Keep an eye on the timer. Try not to kill anyone.

name: Dead Plate
description: Short 2D restaurant tycoon themed rpg horror game with visual novel and point-and-click elements set in 1960s France following the story of a lively waiter named Rody trying to make as much money as possible in a week at a fancy bistro owned by a charismatic and successful chef, Vince.

name: Mirror Floor
description:
Mirror Floor is a fast-paced one-button game.

Your goal is to jump between platfroms with coins on them. You score points by picking up the coins but every coin turns you upside down and mirrors your position on the platform. It also changes which sides of the platforms are active. Press a button to jump and hold a button to speed up. You have to think carefully which coins to pick up in order to proceed forward.

The game is over when you fall.

name: Monsters and Spirits
description: Are you tired of standing there and harvesting monsters waiting in line to die in boredom? Are you tired of the monotony of skill combinations? In the demon spirit, you can completely free yourself from these boredom

name: Divine Pig
description: The player is an ordinary warrior who is turned into a pig when defeated by a water monster in battle. In order to become human again, players need to go through different levels Step by step, transform into human form and acquire skills. Defeat demons through ultimate efforts and become humans.

name: Eschatology
description: This is a snake like game with a pixelated style that is very attractive.

name: Infinite White: Hyperbolic Time Chamber Simulator
description: A walking simulator game where you walk in a completely void and empty space, similar to a Hyperbolic Time Chamber.

name: Ninja Kato 1
description: First in the Ninja Kato series! Now available in the nostalgic portable game style! Clear all 4 stages and train Kato!

name: The King of Creation
description: This is a shooting game with exquisite game backgrounds and character images.

name: Cat Ball: Gravity Maze
description: Help our cat ball find the fish in a gravity controlled maze.

name: Iglacia
description: In this drawing-based roguelite, play as a penguin with a stash of powerful crystals to fight off hordes of enemies by drawing and shooting your way to victory!

name: Small World
description: This is a third person strategy adventure game.

name: Ultimate Tower Defense
description: "Ultimate Tower Defense" is a thrilling and challenging game that puts your strategic skills to the test.

name: Farmer Bundle
description: Farming has never been nicer!

name: A Tale of Two Lovers
description: A Tale of Two Lovers store is a visual novel game for adults only. This game is about two young lovers who like to love each other after the day's rush.

name: Hans
description: Hans is a physics-driven, parkour adventure. Ascend to the sky with our lonely watermelon hero. Navigate treacherous platforms, defy physics by slowing down time, try not to fall and chase the dream of reuniting with humanity. No saves. Bounce, fail, adapt, and bounce again.

name: Elfboarders
description: Battle against your friends as you race down the mountain slope in this multiplayer battle-racing brawler! Play with friends online, through LAN, or try to beat the computers solo. Four player maximum.

name: Europa Universalis IV: King of Kings - Immersion Pack
description: This Immersion Pack to Europa Universalis IV adds greater depth and historical flavor to the nations surrounding the Ottoman Empire. The focus is on the nations of Persia, the Mamluk Sultanate and the Byzantine Empire as each fights to survive in a region rich with conflict, drama and diversity.

name: Football Manager 2024
description: Progress never stops when you're pursuing footballing greatness. Gameplay upgrades empower you to develop a blueprint for success on and off the pitch. Pre-order for 10% off and Early Access*.

name: Playtown
description: Playtown is a horror game set in a kid's abandoned indoor playground. Roam the abandoned kids play areas to uncover and find your daughter's necklace, while unraveling the mystery surrounding the once happy place. Remember, you are not alone - as danger can be lurking at every corner.

name: Emberrush
description: Immerse yourself in a fabulous atmosphere in Emberrush! You have to fight off waves of enemies that are heading towards your settlement.

name: Escape Z
description: Survive the apocalypse with friends in Escape Z. Fight and plan tactics to face hordes of zombies. Choose your character, map and prepare. Survival is your only option.

name: The Awakener: Forgotten Oath
description: The Awakener: Forgotten Oath is a rogue-like action game with a highly flexible combat system. ACT and Rogue-like lovers will embark on a thrilling adventure in a magical world called Sylvalond.

name: Greed is Good
description: In Greed is Good, a PvPvE game, you will enter the mysterious dungeon as a Bounty Hunter. In the game, you need to cooperate with your teammates to fight against enemies and fears. Be aware of the toxic gas and be sure to escape before you are drown out.

name: Kuroinu 2 Redux
description: As the Nation faces invasion from the peoples it has pillaged for a century, one man defends it: Derek Rondo, the second coming of the Mercenary King Vult. He fights for his country, but plots to seize the throne for himself... A new visual novel betrayal epic begins from within!

name: Bullet Town
description: Fight waves of bandits in this crazy hybrid of shooter and roguelike: keep your cool and shoot at the right time, use the scenery to your advantage with surprising effects, claim bounties to upgrade your characters and become Bullet Town’s greatest gunslinger!

name: Deadfall
description: Deadfall is a dark, bloody, atmospheric, dynamic, brutal shooter in the spirit of action movies of the 80s and 90s.

name: Warlordocracy: Chapter 2
description: Warlordocracy Chapter 2: Import your party and reputations from the previous chapter or create a new character from scratch.

name: Impact
description: In Impact, build your deck against hundreds of monsters and defend yourself against your enemies with the best deck. Unlock characters with rogue-lite elements, a wide range of weapons and special abilities as you progress.

name: Gutasaga
description: Gutasaga - 2D Strategy RPG pre-viking era game. Immerse yourself in the 550 - 600 AD saga. Be the Viking who opened trade routes with Constantinople. Encounter over 40 nations with unique cultures on your journey. Succeed in trading 205 historically recreated goods. Or try raids and piracy.

name: Another Day
description: Ivan sets out for the abandoned hospital in the town of Olkhov, where his brother Tolya disappeared after witnessing something horrifying, causing him to stop communicating and eventually vanish.

name: Cursorblade
description: Cursorblade is an action arcade game where you play as a cursor that fights your way through waves of enemies. Combine weapons and items to be more powerful with your own unique builds. Slash, dodge, upgrade and repeat!

name: Living Cell
description: You are the only liquidator in block G-326 of the endless Gigakhrushchevka who survived. Now you have to find out what happened in this block, evacuate the residents and find a way out for yourself. But is everything as obvious as it seems at first glance?

name: The Elephant Collection
description: The Elephant Collection remasters ten of jmtb02’s classic blue elephant games into one mammoth-sized package! From puzzle platformers to rapid-fire arcade games, this collection of ten Armor Games classics is tied together by a new overarching metanarrative.

name: Metria
description:
The starlight is our hope.
An RPG where hope and sin collide.

name: Dash & Swing
description: A fast-paced action platformer, use your acrobatic skills to navigate through challenging levels. Swing and dash through a variety of obstacles to reach the end of each stage. With intuitive controls and thrilling gameplay, Dash & Swing offers an exciting experience for players who love platformers.

name: Survivors of the Dawn
description: Run-based roguelike bullet heaven where you create strategic weapon and item synergies to survive the ceaseless hordes. Remember, every step back is a step towards a whole new strategy.

name: Malware Rewritten
description: A game where you play as a virus, and your goal is to destroy the computer from the inside.

name: Racine
description: Racine is a strategy, card game that will give you dynamic real time combat with increasing intensity. Quickly use your cards to give your character a chance to survive not only the current fight, but also the ones to come. Everything happens in real time so you need to help your avatar by using your cards before he gets crushed by the relentless attacks of the spirit.

name: The Invincible
description: Rethink human’s dominion in The Invincible: a story-driven adventure set in a hard sci-fi world by Stanisław Lem. Discover planet Regis III as scientist Yasna, use atompunk tools looking for a missing crew and face unforeseen threats. Make choices in a philosophical story that’s driven by science.

name: Hypergunners
description: Sin descripción

name: Erina to Kima no Miyako
description: Erina, an engineer and a self-proclaimed adventurer, finds herself in Era Sheila after wandering from place to place fulfilling requests in pursuance of the romantic adventuring dream. The city is named after a famous adventurer, who happens to be one of Erina's aspirations as an adventurer herself. Little did she know, the city had another moniker, widely known as the City of Machines. Just what does this city, one full of sex-starved men, have in store for Erina?

name: Toxicity
description: Shades first ever released Quake 2 singleplayer level - only 25 years later!

name: America Rising 2: Legacy of the Enclave
description: A remake/remaster of the 'America Rising - A Tale of the Enclave' mod, America Rising 2 features a 24 quest main storyline, new fully voiced companions, new worldspaces, and more.

name: 20 Words // 20 Seconds
description: You have 20 seconds. For each prompt, type an English word that meets the criteria above. Words that you have used for an earlier criteria cannot be used again later.

name: Digital Circus: Obby Parkour
description: Pomni is stuck in the Digital Circus and your her is to overcome many blocks and obstacles as she can to reach the finish line. Each level increases in difficulty, and you have to help her with her parkour skills to overcome all obstacles.

name: Breezy Paws
description: Sin descripción

name: Definya
description: Easy Start, Endless Challenge: Begin with a beginner-friendly system that ensures a smooth learning curve. From novice to veteran, Definya's balanced gameplay offers a fulfilling experience.

name: Solitary Cat
description: The ultimate lightweight solitaire featuring simple yet robust rules for hours of dark-mode fun! Based on Klondike, 40 Thieves, and Bakers Game.

name: Uncover
description: Sin descripción

name: Agnostic Requiem
description: An AVG that records the struggles of girls in the melody of the times.

name: Suero Zeus
description: Consigue armas e items que te ayuden a abrirte camino por las regiones infectadas de monstruos sedientos de sangre, ayuda a los pobres sobrevivientes que encuentres en tu camino y encuentra la manera de resolver acertijos que dificultan tu gran escape.

name: Alaca
description: Alaca is an action rogue like game with a Top down perspective. While it contains different types of weapons and elements, you must build and master your character by combining them in the most correct way. There is no save point. kill, build character, learn and repeat..

name: CatExpress
description: Cat Express is a relaxing and healing game that combines running, fishing, and collection gameplay. In the game, you can play as a cat to complete express delivery tasks and earn coins to buy various furniture to decorate your cat house. In your free time, you can also go fishing to relax.

name: Silted Prayer
description: A hundred years ago, the chaotic world was suddenly pacified by the sword saint Nedidora, gradually moving towards peace. However, the crisis of the curse of all things was also uncovered... On the dark world tree, what kind of things will Karulu, as a lord, encounter...

name: Tower of the Mad Wizard
description: In this brutal action, rogue-like, survival RPG chose one of many wily adventurers dead set on conquering the Mad Wizard's Tower. To reach the his sanctum you must conquer hordes of enemies, their ruthless generals and navigate the twisted halls of the Wizard's labyrinth.

name: Spellfield
description: Spellfield is a relaxing farming RPG set in an idyllic town. You can build up your farm, hone your skills, and explore a vibrant, mysterious world.

name: Kaikyuu no Eshi
description: Sin descripción

name: Brutal TD
description: Brutal TD is a minimalist retro-styled tower defense game. Unlike most tower defense games, Brutal TD has you in complete control of your tower, you can choose what enemies to fire at, which enemies you prioritize, and more. Each level gets more challenging and has different enemy types.

name: Pony Sudoku WebGL
description: Classical sudoku game with our favorite ponies.

name: Super Piracy Quest
description:
Long ago, an unknown figure took control of THE CAVE OF HYPE and put an end to PIRACY. Embark on a journey with our protagonist and deuteragonist, Pikachu and Dr. Andonuts respectively to save PIRACY, but more importantly to find one of the greatest artifacts THE CAVE OF HYPE has to offer...THE BAG. Throughout this journey they will meet very few helpful people, and many cows!

Download link: https://rpgmaker.net/games/13022/

name: 10x1024
description: Inspired by LunchLunch's 10x10 Project and the Doomworld 1024 community projects, I decided to mash the two concepts together like chocolate and peanut butter.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Legendary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Suspicious Person Information
description: A short horror game set in Japan. There are two possible endings.

name: Smash Balls
description:
Test your aim and timing in this fun and fast game

Take out all of the red enemies without running out of ammo

Build up a frenzy to unleash hellfire on the enemies

Smash everything and watch it crumble away!

name: Radio Cars
description: Radio Controlled Car Challenge!

name: The Great Battle of Shark Monkey Squirrel Dinossaur Bird Bee
description: This is a story that has never been told before.

name: Puzzle Vacations: Christmas
description:
Wishing you a season full of light and laughter for you and your family.
With tons of challenging puzzles to choose from, stunning scenery to enjoy, you can coddiwomple towards Christmas at your own pace.

name: Puzzle Vacations: Japan
description: Sin descripción

name: The Brutalist Volumes
description: Enter a Quake world of pure concrete, minimalist structures, and eldritch horror. What started as just a map for QBJ2 got out of hand and became a standalone episode.

name: Zombie Defense: Definitive Edition
description: Zombie Defense: Definitive Edition is a bundle of the main game with 6 DLC packs included that unlock extra weapons, character boosting skins and some additional currency for unlocks.

name: Whispered Flight
description: Embark upon a whimsical voyage as a radiant sphere of luminescence, gracefully soaring over the placid waters of a lake cradled within the ancient boughs of a mystical woodland. In pursuit of ethereal lumens, gather your scores under the watchful eyes of the stars, whilst evading the malevolent dark skulls seeking to quench your luminous essence. With a trinity of cherished lives, navigate through the verdant whispers of the old trees, to the gentle cadence of tranquility that accompanies your flight. Delight in the quaint, animated tapestry of nature’s hues as you partake in a casual contest of valor with fellow wanderers upon the leaderboard, in this gentle ballet of light against the encroaching shadow.

name: VRC Pro: Xtreme Oval Track Pack 3
description: Contains 3 spectacular oval lay-outs starting with Xtreme Bo1 (long) and MO1 (medium). The Xtreme track is designed and developed by VRC and contains a unique crossing. The short oval track XTR OT3 will be automatically added to this pack when it becomes available!

name: VRC Pro: Welkom Arena 2018 Worlds Track Pack 2
description: The Welkom Arena, home of the 2018 IFMAR Worlds 1:10 and 1:12 electric. Located in Welkom South Africa, the Welkom Arena is one of the biggest indoor facilities in the world and allows even for nitro racing! This track pack contains the 1:10 ISTC Worlds and the 1:12 sportscars Worlds lay-out.

name: VRC Pro: Welkom Arena Lay-out 3-4-5-6 Track Pack 4
description: The Welkom Arena, home of the 2018 IFMAR Worlds 1:10 and 1:12 electric. Located in Welkom South Africa, the Welkom Arena is one of the biggest indoor facilities in the world and allows even for nitro racing as it uses a high grip asphalt surface! This pack contains 4 extra Welkom Arena tracks!

name: VRC Pro: Dirt Pack 3
description: VRC Pro: Dirt Course Pack 3 containing Short course 2, Long course 3, and the Drift course 4. Easy to run, hard to perform!

name: Johou Battle
description: Johou Battle is a bullet hell shoot 'em up game putting you in the shoes of Jotaro Kujo, the legendary fighter of Jojo's Bizarre Adventure fame or Ichirin Kumoi, a fighting spirit from Touhou Project, and pits you against the other! Take on a barrage of attacks based on those seen in Jojo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders and Touhou Project: Hopeless Masquerade in this challenging yet loving tribute to the two franchises!

name: Gem Wizard
description: Gem Wizard: Match gems, cast spells, and collect relics as you venture through a perilous dungeon. Battle fierce foes, build your wizard's power, and face the ultimate boss to save the realm. A fusion of puzzle-solving and RPG action!

name: Nonogram Nights
description: Nonogram Nights is a spooky puzzler where you use logic to uncover a mysterious picture.

name: One Week With The Mafia
description: After a misuse of your home address, and the general incompetence of an old friend, you find yourself stuck with the Italian mafia hunting you down. In this parody of Scott Cawthon's "Five Nights at Freddy's", it is up to you to stop the mafia from wasting you.

name: Chicken Done
description: The more stressful anti-stress game that eleven out of ten psychologists advice against. Dangerously addictive for neurodivergent people.

name: Corked
description: A Ski and Snowboard game for skiers and snowboarders. Get Corked.

name: Australian Maze
description: Are you afraid of spiders?, then this game is not for you. You will feel like a resident of Australia. There are more spiders in this country than stars in the universe. The spiders here are huge and each of them wants to bite you in the ass.

name: Totality
description: A simulation of a total solar eclipse, complete with time control, a pane of #14 welding glass, and a pinhole projector.

name: Sex Lens: A Porn Story
description: Sex Lens: A Porn Story is a visual novel that places the keys to an intriguing cinematic world in your hands. You have the opportunity to participate in a luxurious and creative process, but be prepared for challenges that present you with difficult choices.

name: Absolute Color Perception
description: Absolute color sense is a very test of color sense eye game. Among the many colors, can you tell which one is different?

name: Silver Moonlight
description: After many consecutive victories, the fierce Orc warriors began to attack the capital of the kingdom of Lusnistan. The fall of the kingdom of Lusnistan is now only a matter of time.

name: Real Car Parking: 2024 Authentic Simulation
description: This game is a parking simulation type. You have a wide choice of supercars in your garage. There are many levels in the game that you pass in one breath. The realistic graphics give you the feeling of presence in the scene where the action takes place. Enjoy your time here.

name: Fire Breakout
description: Fire breakout is a fire-themed simulation game, which aims to restore the real daily fire scene, through the fire phenomenon in the game scene, with the help of tools, players can judge and deal with fire accidents.

name: Dark Bunny
description: You are the Dark Bunny. You want carrots. You kill farm animals to get carrots. That's it. That's the game. In this roguelite, topdown arena, semi autobattler you will use various skills and items to create unique, powerful builds to defeat all the mega evil farm animals. And get all the carrots!

name: Fireworks Frenzy
description:
Fireworks Frenzy is a Small multiplayer fireworks game, with hundreds of fireworks and multiple maps, that tries to give you the experience and the feeling of the beautiful fireworks to blow up stuffs together.

The controls of Fireworks Frenzy are really simple. You need to simply move, pick the fireworks from the inventory and place it on the map and ignite. You can also connect, rotate and delete the placed fireworks. You can use either keyboard or controller as input device.

With Fireworks Frenzy, you'll have access to a wide variety of colorful and exciting fireworks, from sparkling fountains to booming aerial shells, all designed to help you create the most spectacular firework show possible.

There are multiple maps to pick. They are quite huge and each map is unique and you can explore the ones you like. You can also go to the moon or to Mars along with your friends to blow some fireworks and nuke Mars.

You can play fireworks frenzy either alone or with your friends. You can also customize your player character based on your preferences and unlock accessories by collecting items from the map.

With endless possibilities for creativity and exploration, it's the perfect way to light up your imagination. Fireworks Frenzy is a great game for relaxing, clearing your head for some time, and experience the magic of the fireworks in a whole new way with your friends!

name: You Must Become A Lich
description: Become a powerful Lich in this Coin Pusher RPG. Push Coins, Collect Prizes, Build An Army and Take over the World!

name: Cards and Castles 2
description: Collectible cards spring to life in this wacky Tactical CCG. Assemble a deck to challenge your friends and rivals, and engage in glorious CARD BATTLES! Will you choose fearsome dragons, or the deadly squirrels?

name: Kamikaze
description: Kamikaze is a hack I have been making for a few years that I feel is ready to be finally played by others. I feel it's right at high Kaizo beginner to low intermediate for skill range.

name: Extraordinary Detective Marshall
description: The year is 2008. A series of murders has been shaking up the town of East Orenji for the past two years. Will you, Detective Marshall, be able to uncover the truth behind these seemingly unconnected incidents?

name: Interrogator
description: A text-based, interrogation-centered puzzle game with text and voice as the main inputs. Each of the 18 cases is a self-contained mystery for you to solve. It is up to you to eradicate crime in the tri-state area once and for all.

name: Doomed PETSCII Pacman
description:
In Doomed PETSCII Pacman, almost everything works a little bit differently. For example, eating power pellets can have terrible effects, but they are needed to level up. Eating ghosts is deadly in any case.

Unlike conventional Pac-Man with Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde, Doomed PETSCII Pac-Man also has Zinky and Drinky. Don't expect to enjoy this game – it's not designed for that.

name: Fortnite: Heartbreaker Ranger Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Happy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mafia Thief
description: Mafia Thief is a third-person stealth game. Break in 6 unique missions into houses, mansions, a warehouse or a junkyard to steal more than 100 different items. Complete the missions and follow the exciting story. Avoid security guards, residents and the police. Get ready for the hardest thief experience of the year!

name: Bowser's Revenge 3
description:
Just a normal standard hack. A bit shorter than the previous games, with this one only having 5 worlds?

Anyway lots of custom stuff in this hack. Music, sprites, graphics and stuff.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game: Generations
description: Pokemon TCG Generations is a ROM Hack of the original Pokemon Trading Card Game, where the cards, attacks, attributes, resistances, weaknesses, and various effects have been extensively altered and expanded. This ROM Hack introduces Pokemon from nearly all generations of the franchise, offering a fresh and exciting take on the traditional card game experience.

name: Pawfectly Designed
description: Design, Play, Imagine - Pawfectly Designed lets kids create enchanting worlds for their furry friends and design their dream spaces!

name: Midnight Monitor: Halloween Forever
description: Do you wish it could be Halloween every day? Now it can be!

name: Chimeras: Price of Greed - Collector's Edition
description: People are disappearing left and right in the Carrington Mansion. But who's behind it, how are they doing it, and most importantly, what are they hiding?

name: Call of Toys: Tower Defense!
description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey to protect Santa's Valley in this epic Tower Defense game, a 2D strategic Tower Defense game inspired by classic TD games.

Explore an arsenal of 13 unique towers, each equipped with magical spells and exclusive abilities. Customize your towers with numerous upgrades that enhance their strength and unlock new magical powers.

But that's not all! Your towers can be equipped with a variety of items, including armor, helmets, shields, amulets, rings, and an impressive selection of weapons such as swords, axes, hammers, magic wands, and bows.

name: Uknon Jones & Guynelk: Awesome!
description: After a tragedy, Uknon Jones, Guynelk and Elsa decide to meet the doctor Gamma to save their friends. Explore this open world and find all the hidden G-atoms in the world to power the time machine from the doctor to hope to change things!

name: Black Diamond
description: Black Diamond is a set of 5 boom-compatible maps set in the cavernous void of the sea. Uncover a forgotten civilization on your quest for the Black Diamond, a mystical artifact said to let its bearer see beyond death.

name: Moto Highway: Racing Speed Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: Warcraft Rumble: Season 1
description: The launch season for Warcraft Rumble, adding a new mini.

name: Sora to Kimi Iro
description: Sora to Kimi Iro is a visual novel with a trial version released for PC on November 3, 2023.

name: Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch - The Arabian Horse Pack
description: Continue your experience by bringing a brand new horse breed into your stable: The legendary Arabian thoroughbred!

name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season OG
description:
Drop in the original Island once again in Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 4 Season OG. Throughout “Fortnite OG,” each major update will bring a different phase of Battle Royale’s past, starting with Chapter 1 Season 5. That means Shopping Carts, ATKs, the Assault Rifle, Pump Shotgun, and more in both Battle Royale and Zero Build!

Go back in time Season by Season. Some of the unvaulted gear in each update will remain for that update, be in more than one update, or stay for the rest of Fortnite OG!

name: Hole io: Freak Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Rush GT: Platinium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Delator
description: Overcome your deepest nightmares and face your unavoidable fate. `Delator´ is a cosmic horror puzzle-platformer where you will play the role of a skittish doctor chosen by the cult of Delator to be the last sacrifice.

name: Don't Panic
description: Navigate through ever-changing mazes and outsmart inanimate pursuers. Trust your flashlight and compass, but never let your guard down!

name: KunKunNight
description: This is a fictional story in which you will embark on a thrilling escape experience with a man named KunKun.The game contains scare elements. If you lack courage, please exit in a timely manner.

name: _Message:
description: A Korean interactive puzzle game.

name: Pocket Race: Driver
description: Pocket Race: Manager is a miniature race driving game with simple controls, but demanding driving and some strategic elements and lots of different car parts. Push other miniature cars off the track into the void! Don't fall yourself...

name: Skibidi Backrooms
description: Skibidi Backrooms is a cooperative horror game for a group of 4 players. Solo mode is also available. You have to survive among the backrooms and find a way out before you are overtaken by the Skibidi toilet. Updates and various interesting things await you...

name: Song Song
description: The story is about a detective This is a psychological puzzle game, The game belongs to the psychological horror genre.

name: Wound Man
description: Wound Man is your guide on a gruesome adventure through the ages. Piece his epic story together while literally piecing him together. Poke, prod, stab and slice away to reveal his secrets. It's a jigsaw adventure! - but not for the faint of heart.

name: Carprogram
description: An application that lets you lay down roads, this is your future non-fictional story.

name: Blood Orange: Definitive Edition
description: Underwater psychological horror with a shocking, character-driven narrative. Explore ruins beneath the amazon river basin, and converse with their dolphin inhabitants. Skillfully capture and develop photographs with your underwater camera.

name: Aversion
description: Experience the challenging events Iris faces through her journey.

name: Ball Hentai Puzzle
description: Ball Hentai Puzzle is a puzzle solving game with the objective of reaching the end with at least one life remaining. This game allows you to have calm and relaxing moments. Enjoy beautiful women while solving your puzzles.

name: Iruka ni Uroko ga Nai Wake
description: Specially to selfish Honey Mustard-chan who stays up until this hour, I think I should explain to her why dolphins don't have scales.

name: DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing: Rally Pack
description: The DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing Rally Pack exclusively includes Kung Fu Panda's Master Oogway and Puss in Boots: The Last Wish's Wolf as playable characters, unique karts inspired by the characters plus spoilers, wheels, engines and different chassis designs to completely customize their karts.

name: DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing: Rally Edition
description: DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing Rally Edition is the ultimate kart racing experience for DreamWorks Animation fans young and young at heart by bundling the full game together with the DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing Rally Pack's exclusive characters and content in one action-packed offering.

name: Mądra Głowa
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Overnet
description: Project Overnet is an exhilarating and immersive digital card game where winning requires strategy and execution. Resolve the pattern challenges and harness the power of your M.I.N.D to prove yourself worthy to become the first OverKnight.

name: SCP: Bloodwater
description: SCP Bloodwater is a strategy management defense game inspired by the SCP Foundation's SCP-354, also known as the Red Pool. Take the role of a newly appointed Site Director at the Red Pool Containment Zone, harvest valuable organic material, and defend the facility against the Red Pool's attacks.

name: Cat Fred Evil Pet
description: Care for a cute cat Fred. If the pet is displeased, a horror game will start!

name: Blacksite Theta
description: A 3D puzzle platformer developed as a project for the 2023 UW-Whitewater Capstone Course. Harness your newfound mutant arm powers to conquer challenging terrain, ultimately unlocking your path to freedom by solving puzzles and navigating treacherous obstacles to escape the facility.

name: Pumpkin Game
description: "Pumpkin Game" is a falling object puzzle game in which players try to pile up as many vegetables as possible so that they do not overflow from the basket. When two or more vegetables collide with each other, they combine and evolve into a larger vegetable.

name: Cozy Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Cozy Jigsaw Puzzle is not just a game; it's a serene journey that takes you to a world of beauty and peace. Experience the joy of solving puzzles in the coziest way possible. Get ready to lose yourself in the gentle challenge and embrace the art of relaxation.

name: Sacabambaspis Chronicle
description: As a player, you become Sacabambaspis and live each day with your fellow Sacabambaspis, growing and evolving by swimming in the sea and eating plankton. Progress through the story with your companions in Sacabambaspis, and see what happens in the end.

name: Roads Construction Sim
description: Embark on a thrilling journey into the world of civil engineering and road construction with Roads Construction Sim.

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Diamond Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Knights & Guns: Diamond Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Silent Swan: Rising in the Mist Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Ancient Secret
description: Relaxing puzzle game for a good mood

name: Greg's Deadly Draft
description: You have been kidnapped by an evil mascot named Greg White Shark. Traverse through the stadium and battle for your life as he tries to recruit you for his failing football team.

name: Telluria: Forebodings Gear Minigame - Final Stage
description: A puzzle-solving stage involving objects crafting and inventory use

name: I Commissioned Some Cats 5
description: I paid artists to hide cats and wool in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Delicious: Cooking and Romance
description: Join Emily & her family in a new Delicious Restaurant and Time Management game.

name: Laruaville 9
description: Use your Match 3 skills to build an empire! As usually there are also some optional bonus game and a town to build!

name: Easy VTT
description: The easiest Tabletop without all the bloat! Need a grid that scales perfectly to your maps? Or a fog-of-war system that just works? Easy VTT can setup and host your table within minutes for up to 8 friends! Save hundreds of custom tables with ease! Don't let your VTT distract from what matters!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations: Random 6
description: Random puzzles!

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Archangel Bonus Episode
description: A bonus DLC episode for The Expanse announced as part of its Deluxe Edition and set to be released after the 5 episode story is finished in September.

name: Milfy City: Final Edition
description: Milfy City is an erotic adult game. Play as a college student trying to navigate his way through a city filled with hot women! Meet a cast of seductive ladies, enjoy erotic animations, and discover sexy secrets and hidden collectibles!

name: One Night: Burlesque
description: Step into the smoky, seductive world of the Angels Den, a luxurious burlesque club. Get into the high heels of Holly, a talented dancer graced with a unique gift of telepathy. Help her on a desperate mission to save a friend from certain doom.

name: Wedding Witch
description: There is a witch here preparing to marry you. She embarks on an adventure to find the succubus's potion to seduce you. But a forest filled with demons stands in her way... Will she be able to find the succubus's potion and have a happy wedding?

name: Oasis: Tokyo
description: Oasis: Tokyo is an FPS with a focus on inventory management that has roguelite elements. Complete procedurally generated missions in a shady underworld.

name: ATV Monster Racing Simulator Rally Cross
description: Are you ready for the ultimate ATV off-road racing adventure?

name: Ring Racer
description: Navigate through rings in stunning canyons and race against the clock.

name: DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing
description:
Twenty of the most iconic DreamWorks Animation characters take the wheel in the fast-paced world of kart racing in DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing!

Shift, drift and jump at high speeds across a variety of fantastical tracks inspired by DreamWorks Animation’s many fan-favorite films. Blaze past the competition in fun and hilarious action for players of all ages with solo as well as online and local split-screen multiplayer modes.

name: Logic Escape
description: Put your intellect to the test with challenging escape rooms featuring high interactivity and intricate logical puzzles. Observe, search for clues, combine information, apply logical reasoning, and uncover mysteries through exploration.

name: Elewar: Fused Survivors
description: Slay, evolve and overcome! Packed with challenging events, non-basic enemies and deep ARPG-like systems! In this horde survival roguelite you use elemental powers to defeat terrifying monsters, while trying to become a godlike magician. 15+ spells, 70+ unlocks, over 30 random events and much more!

name: Rarity Chase
description: Rarity Chase is an adventure for board game fans. Quickly learn simple rules, roll the die and go in search of an ancient artifact. Find and wisely use resources and bonuses. Play alone against AI, with friends on the same computer or online.

name: Parking Tycoon: Business Simulator
description: Are you ready to immerse yourself in the exhilarating world of car parking management? Step into the shoes of a visionary entrepreneur and become the ultimate Parking Lot Tycoon! Take Charge and embark on a thrilling journey of strategy, expansion, and success.

name: March of the Drunken Sailors
description:
Defend the sea from the menace of these sailors, who wish for nothing more than to embark on another fishing trip. Unite the denizens of the sea to stop the coming menace before they can reach their vessel.

There are no health bars or damage numbers here, only mass. Instead of defeating an enemy through traditional means, you’ll need to push and pull your foes off the dock and into the sea to stop them from setting off to fish the sea once again.

name: WarioWare: Move It!
description:
Strike a pose with a multitude of motion-based microgames in a brand-new entry in the WarioWare series!
Grab a pair of Joy-Con controllers and get moving as you gently shake, punch, dance, wiggle, and even curtsey through over 200 lightning-fast microgames (minigames that last just a few hilarious seconds). A second player can use another set of Joy-Con controllers to join the treasure-guarding, sheep-twirling fun. Up to 4 players, each with one Joy-Con controller, can laugh out loud in the local Party Mode’s minigames like a dicey board game with Wario-style rules.

name: Marine Glory
description: Marine Glory is a single player sailing looting adventure. Find treasures, buy and upgrade new ships and explore multiple universes.

name: Jumanji: Wild Adventures
description: Explore Jumanji’s lost world of dangerous beasts and secret treasures.

name: Supracore
description: Supracore is a roguelike base building game. Build your base, upgrade it and defend against ongoing waves of enemies to gather more resource and expand your Core!

name: Brothers in Hell
description: After you die, Death gives you the chance to come back to the world of the living to fulfill your deepest desire. Take the chance. Get back on your feet, and claim your revenge in this stealth action-adventure game

name: Streamer Girl Simulator
description: Streamer Girl Simulator is a fun and exciting simulation game where players can create their own streaming career for their custom streamer girl character.

name: PlateUp!: Collector's Edition
description:
PlateUp!: Collector's Edition includes:
- Game: PlateUp!
- 4 Mini Figurines

name: Ebenezer and the Invisible World
description: Embark on a story-rich 2D Metroidvania adventure with breathtaking hand-drawn art, playing as miser-turned-hero Ebenezer Scrooge in a reimagined Victorian-fantasy based on Charles Dickens’ classic novel, A Christmas Carol. Enlist the help of ghosts to save the people of London before it’s too late.

name: Logic Town
description: Logic Town is a challenging coffee-break puzzle game based on Einstein Puzzles (AKA Zebra Puzzles). Solve the puzzles to redecorate various scenes in a Seaside Town. Each new location unlocks a new puzzle theme!

name: Pokémon Violet + The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero
description:
A bundle that includes both the Pokémon Violet game and The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero DLC

Catch, battle, and train Pokémon in the Paldea region, a vast land filled with lakes, towering peaks, wastelands, small towns, and sprawling cities. Explore a wide-open world at your own pace and traverse land, water, and air by riding on the form-shifting Legendary Pokémon Miraidon. Choose either Sprigatito, Fuecoco, or Quaxly to be your first partner Pokémon before setting off on your journey through Paldea.

Adventure beyond the Paldea region in Pokémon Violet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero

Even more Pokémon, places, and stories await in this 2-part DLC for the Pokémon Violet game! In Part 1: The Teal Mask, join a special school trip to the land of Kitakami. In Part 2: The Indigo Disk, study abroad at Blueberry Academy! Encounter the newly-discovered Legendary Pokémon Ogerpon and Terapagos as you broaden your horizons beyond Uva Academy and explore even more of the Pokémon world.

name: Pokémon Scarlet + The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero
description:
A bundle that includes both the Pokémon Scarlet game and The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero DLC

Catch, battle, and train Pokémon in the Paldea region, a vast land filled with lakes, towering peaks, wastelands, small towns, and sprawling cities. Explore a wide-open world at your own pace and traverse land, water, and air by riding on the form-shifting Legendary Pokémon Miraidon. Choose either Sprigatito, Fuecoco, or Quaxly to be your first partner Pokémon before setting off on your journey through Paldea.

Adventure beyond the Paldea region in Pokémon Violet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero

Even more Pokémon, places, and stories await in this 2-part DLC for the Pokémon Violet game! In Part 1: The Teal Mask, join a special school trip to the land of Kitakami. In Part 2: The Indigo Disk, study abroad at Blueberry Academy! Encounter the newly-discovered Legendary Pokémon Ogerpon and Terapagos as you broaden your horizons beyond Uva Academy and explore even more of the Pokémon world.

name: StrangerZ
description: StrangerZ is a Free to Play Multiplayer Survival Horror game. Play as or survive against the "Stranger" with your teammates until dawn. Level up your stats and rank by either surviving or killing all players.

name: Strange House
description: Сity of sadness, where everyone tries to survive, in which there is no place for anyone and which is infinitely huge. It absorbs everyone who is not ready to live by its rules. Are you ready for this?

name: Raining Blood: Hellfire
description: Annihilate countless hordes of enemies while unraveling the mysteries of the demonic invasion in this CoD Zombies-inspired bullet Hell. Kill, upgrade, explore, die, repeat.

name: Arise from Shadows
description: Lost, isolated, you must find the truth by exploring the remains of an ancient extinct civilization. With your animal possession abilities, you have all the tools to find the answers to your questions.

name: Delicious Dungeon
description: Delicious Dungeon is a combination of action-adventure and simulation game. The player is the owner of a local restaurant in a fantasy world. But to run the restaurant they have to explore dungeons full of dangers and enemies to get the ingredients needed to cook delicious meals for their guests.

name: Come Together
description: A Puzzle-Adventure game where your main goal is to connect 2 squares together. Solve puzzles, explore and find items and secrets, overcome difficult challenges, complete side quests and make friends, learn new mechanics and use all your knowledge to lead your way to success!

name: Frigato: Shadows of the Caribbean
description: Frigato: Shadows of the Caribbean is a challenging Real-Time Tactics stealth game set in the intriguing realm of pirates. Take command over a motley crew of sea rogues and beat the British Royal Navy to the Caribbean’s most valuable treasure.

name: Spiritus
description: Albert and Rose investigate a manor with miscreants and broken souls. Stay together and survive the horror.

name: Back to the Dawn
description: An exciting RPG set in a maximum-security prison populated by animals of every shape and size. Survive, explore, and escape! Along the way, you’ll interact with a motley crew of interesting and unique characters. Be strong and be smart! It's not just yourself you're saving, it's the whole city!

name: Warcraft Rumble
description: Warcraft Rumble is a mobile action strategy game where collectible Warcraft Minis come to life to clash in epic melee battles. Whether you choose to play in the massive single player campaign or compete head-to-head in epic PvP battles, prepare to experience the true meaning of joyful chaos!

name: The Silent Swan
description: The Silent Swan is a first-person open world narrative experience across a monolithic, derelict world. Mixing both the walking simulator and open world genres together, the game brings the meaning of openness to urban areas for the first time to this scale.

name: Tsukihime: A Piece of Blue Glass Moon - Limited Edition
description: The Limited Edition includes Tsukihime -A Piece of Blue Glass Moon-, the Special Material Book “Tsukihime Material Ⅰ -material of blue glass moon-“ and a Collector’s Box.

name: Destiny's Divide
description: Free PvP Fantasy Card Game that assigns real world value to in-game cards. But are you good enough to unlock them? Become a grand master of war strategy by dominating the ancient battles of Destiny's Divide. Conquer competitive game modes and receive one of a kind unique cards you can trade or sell.

name: Jajazinho e as Delicias de Cristais
description: "Jajazinho e as Delicias de Cristais" is an adventure game - rescue the gorgeous princess Shemacol from the devilish villain Demalixo! Through your journey, you'll face off against big and juicy enemies to find the coveted delicious crystals!

name: Quantum Error
description: Quantum Error is a cosmic-horror FPS.

name: Ranch Simulator
description: Builder. Farmer. Hunter. Trader. Ranching certainly isn't your average job. Think you have the skills to turn your family's rundown homestead into the most prosperous ranch in the valley? Then it's time to head out into the wilderness in this captivating single and multiplayer open-world simulator.

name: L.A. Meltdown 2047
description: A large map that reinterprets all of episode 1: L.A. Meltdown.

name: Ice Block Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: Waxwing
description: A collaborative arcade game in which two players use light guns to guide a moth and other characters along a dangerous path.

name: Flashing Lights: Visor Lights DLC
description: Customise your police, fire and EMS vehicles further than ever before with the free Visor Lights DLC! This pack gives you access to a large variety of visor light types, and allows you to customise them extensively - including colours and light patterns.

name: Nope Nope Nurses Melee
description: The unbelievable spinoff off Sakusei Byoutou! You might not believe it, but it's now a 2D fighting game! It's kill or be killed, and either way you're getting sucked dry!

name: Tap Tap Reloaded
description: Tap Tap Reloaded is the ultimate community-driven rhythm game experience. Reloaded is built on what the community wants in a mobile rhythm game. Tap Tap Reloaded is powered by a highly qualified and experienced team of the best Tap Tap players in the world.

name: Zen 2212 A.D.
description: A single Doom 2 map, set in a futuristic dystopian city.

name: Our Guest Tonight
description:
Presenting a new late show... Our Guest Tonight!
Hosted by Jack! And our guest tonight is… Bob?!
Play as the audience in this brand-new Late Show. Show your support for Bob by spamming the Clap Button, and share your thoughts about Jack by spamming the Boo button.
Be careful! Everyone loves Bob. By not clapping, you might hurt his feelings, and the show might not go well. As for Jack, he's too cocky to be a host, so make sure to humble him down!

name: Peaky Blinders: The King's Ransom - Complete Edition
description: Prove you have what it takes to join the Peaky Blinders in The King's Ransom, a narrative VR game inspired by the epic gangster drama. Complete with all DLC included – including 7 additional missions and challenges!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Builder's Beach and Ball Clothing Pack
description: Includes swimsuits and ball attire for your builder; each set comes in 4 different colors that you can mix and match. A set includes a top, a bottom, headwear, shoes, and 3 accessories.

name: Shin Pokemon: Green Version
description: Started in 2018 by a secret cabal of ancient Pokemon nerds, Shin Pokemon is an enhancement ROM hack of Pokemon Red & Blue that aims to be the ultimate remaster fans never got. It is a mostly-vanilla hack that focuses on fixing game engine bugs and oversights from the original game. Additionally, trainer AI routines are improved and multiple quality-of-life enhancements have been added. It also acts as a kind of research-informed speculative work that interprets what the 2016 Nintendo Virtual Console re-release of Gen-1 Pokemon could have been. It is the image of a glitch-free experience with player-friendly goodies and enhancements common to other modern remasterings.

name: Shin Pokemon: Red Version
description: Started in 2018 by a secret cabal of ancient Pokemon nerds, Shin Pokemon is an enhancement ROM hack of Pokemon Red & Blue that aims to be the ultimate remaster fans never got. It is a mostly-vanilla hack that focuses on fixing game engine bugs and oversights from the original game.
